physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features the front exterior of a multi-storey roofed building. It has numerous windows and a triangular roof where two flags are hung. ""Shackle Club"" is stated at the front of the building. ""NAAFI"" is stated to the right and left of ""Shackle Club"". There are several vehicles
title_text: Shackle Club Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: such as cars and jeeps clubs (associations)
subject_terms_2: parked at the entrance of the building. A number of people can be seen walking along the roads adjacent to the building." Recreation centres Navy, Army and Air Force Institutes
